title: How can new tech innovations feed billions in a sustainable and climate-smart way?
arranger: Johan Jörgensen, Anders Sewerin, Catja Färdig, Federico Ronca
description: From restaurant logistics to domestic agriculture, innovations in the food technology space are expanding. But how can such technologies as artificial intelligence, virtual reality, internet of things, cellular agriculture, molecular sensors, etc find their application in food industry & disrupt it?
extendedDescription: The event will start with a presentation and panel discussion where everyone is welcome to take part in! During the whole time there will be plenty of opportunities to meet and talk with startup companies working with foodtech.
